channel.title: Heh appealing on account 5 years old
channel.description:
I just tried appealing for an account that was banned in 2k1 or 2k2 for SCAR use. Damn autologin kept on logging me in a corner when I was autotraining and some noob reported me. I tried the whole suicide deal so maybe it will work. Anyways, if it does get unbanned I have a lvl 94(well it was 94 on rsc, dunno what it would be on rs2) with 40 santas and a red white and blue p hat waiting for me. I appealed a long time ago but it still let me appeal so it might work heh...
Anyone ever get any really old accounts unbanned?
*EDIT* Err yeah this wasn't 2k1 or 2k2: From: Jagex Subject: Re: RuneScape support query 612568 Date: 13 Dec 2003 00:00

item.title: Heh appealing on account 5 years old
item.dc:creator: @precise precise
item.description:
@precise wrote:

Ummm nope not a lie? Let me copy n paste the message I sent to jagex from like 2k2. EHHH ur right… Not exactly a lie, just an error reading my first appeal:[br][size=1]Posted at: May 04, 2006, 01:41:59 pm[/size][hr]
From: Jagex
Subject: Re: RuneScape support query 612568
Date: 13 Dec 2003 00:00

Hi,

I am sorry to say that your ban appeal has not been
successful.

This decision is final and any further ban appeals
will not be considered.

Sincerely
The RuneScape support team

Read full topic

item.title: Heh appealing on account 5 years old
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

Link0114:

I think that it is impossible for jagex to get your acc back see when RS1 became RS2 the old accounts could be transferred BY the player for about 1 month and when the time ran out all of the rs1 accounts became RSC accounts and only for RSC so you cannot bring it back sorry

No actually your wrong, they automatically got transfered, you didnt have to do it manually. I didnt start playing rs again until a year or two after rsc.

Read full topic
item.source: Heh appealing on account 5 years old

item.title: Heh appealing on account 5 years old

item.description:

I think that it is impossible for jagex to get your acc back see when RS1 became RS2 the old accounts could be transferred BY the player for about 1 month and when the time ran out all of the rs1 accounts became RSC accounts and only for RSC so you cannot bring it back sorry

item.title: Heh appealing on account 5 years old
item.dc:creator: @precise precise
item.description:
@precise wrote:

Snipe:

[quote]tried the whole suicide deal so maybe it will work.

I put I matured too in there.

How the hell do you do that?

[quote]If you don’t give me my character back, I’ll have to kill my self. My life is in your hands.

PS I have matured alot too.[/quote]

I don’t see you getting that character back.[/quote]

Wait huh? Mature people do not kill themselves? Your wording is very different from mine by the way

Read full topic
item.source: Heh appealing on account 5 years old

item.title: Heh appealing on account 5 years old
item.dc:creator: @Snipe Snipe
item.description:
@Snipe wrote:

tried the whole suicide deal so maybe it will work.
I put I matured too in there.

How the hell do you do that?

If you don't give me my character back, I'll have to kill my self. My life is in your hands.

PS I have matured alot too.

I don’t see you getting that character back.

Read full topic
item.source: Heh appealing on account 5 years old

item.title: Heh appealing on account 5 years old
item.dc:creator: @precise precise
item.description:
@precise wrote:

[quote=“jme_009, post:2, topic:1901”]I doubt the suicide thing will work, I’d just say something like you’ve grown up and matured over the last 5 years, and would like to play from your account again.[/quote] I put I matured too in there.
I lost connection right when I sent though, and I had to click back and forward to resend. Hopefully I didn’t just send an appeal with empty text lol… They still haven’t replied yet.

Read full topic
